author: Roland Hutchinson
title: Apple Watch Ultra 3: The Battery Life You’ve Been Waiting For?
description: Apple is preparing to launch the highly anticipated Apple Watch Ultra 3 on September 9th, alongside other flagship products. While this new addition to the Ultra series may not introduce new changes, it promises thoughtful refinements in areas such as battery…
